Proj_Tasks.taskDescription: Implement secure login functionality for library staff and users, ensuring only authorized access to the system, enhancing data privacy and security.
Develop a platform for new and existing students to register for courses, manage personal details, and track academic progress, ensuring smooth administrative processes and student engagement.
Develop a system to monitor water consumption across various sectors, track usage patterns, and identify areas for conservation, promoting sustainable water management practices.
Develop a comprehensive system for patient registration, maintaining electronic health records, and managing appointments, ensuring efficient workflows and accurate documentation.
Implement a solution for detecting leaks in water distribution systems, promptly identifying and repairing issues to minimize water loss and optimize resource utilization.
Develop a platform for managing orders from various channels, tracking order status, and coordinating kitchen operations, ensuring timely preparation and delivery of meals.
Implement a solution for managing medical supplies, tracking inventory levels, and facilitating procurement processes, ensuring availability of essential supplies for patient care.
Implement a feature for customizing menus, updating prices, and managing promotions, providing flexibility to adapt offerings based on customer preferences and market trends.
Create a scheduling system for doctors and staff, optimizing shifts, managing rotations, and ensuring adequate coverage to meet patient needs and maintain operational efficiency.
Implement a system for faculty members to manage their schedules, submit grades, communicate with students, and access resources, facilitating efficient teaching and administrative tasks.
Create a module to calculate fines for overdue books, considering factors like loan duration and fine rates, providing accurate penalties for late returns, and facilitating fair transactions.

Client_Meetings.meetingTopic: User Feedback Analysis and System Improvement
Faculty Training Workshop on Online Teaching Tools
Assessment and Grading Policy Alignment Session
Progress Review Meeting for Water Conservation Initiative
Quality Assurance Meeting for Healthcare Services
Menu Design and Pricing Strategy Meeting
